page.title: 08The High School, Kesgrave
page.content: There are approximately 830 children at Kesgrave High School, aged from 11 to 16. There are about 40 teachers and they teach subjects like Mathematics, English, Science, Craft Design and Technology, History, Languages, Geo- graphy, PE, and RE. In the school there is no 6th Form but about 50% of the children take GCE examinations. The school buildings are also used as an Adult Education Centre in the evenings. Each year there are about 5000 students taking some kind of evening classes, including Basketball, Badminton, Cookery, Home Improvements, Keep Fit, English, Maths and lots of other subjects, even about how to service your car. The school has been in use for 53 years, since 1932. Kesgrave High School covers about 20 acres of land.
